Sentencas: Magnesium-doped lanthanum silicate with apatite-type structure was prepared by solid state sintering, as a solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of Heat Treatment Temperature on Performance of Plasma-Sprayed Apatite-Lanthanum Silicate Coatings as Electrolytes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrolyte layers were fabricated by air plasma spraying, followed by post heat treatments, and their microstructures and phase composition were characterized by SEM and XRD.
Titulo: Effect of Heat Treatment Temperature on Performance of Plasma-Sprayed Apatite-Lanthanum Silicate Coatings as Electrolytes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The gas permeation of electrolyte layers was measured by a specific instrument with pure H-2 and O-2 at room temperature.
Titulo: Effect of Heat Treatment Temperature on Performance of Plasma-Sprayed Apatite-Lanthanum Silicate Coatings as Electrolytes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: It is shown that amorphous and trace phases exist in as-sprayed electrolyte layer, and then disappear after a post heat treatment in air furnace at temperature up to 1000 A degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of Heat Treatment Temperature on Performance of Plasma-Sprayed Apatite-Lanthanum Silicate Coatings as Electrolytes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The permeability can be decreased by the heat treatment, especially after 4 h at 1000 A degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of Heat Treatment Temperature on Performance of Plasma-Sprayed Apatite-Lanthanum Silicate Coatings as Electrolytes for IT-SOFC
